#### FAQ

We will be building up a Frequently Asked Questions section as soon as we receive questions from YOU!

Please e-mail your questions to [The Nature Conservancy's LANDFIRE e-mail.](mailto:landfire@tnc.org)  



<br>


#### Getting help

If you need help with LANDFIRE data, contact helpdesk@landfire.gov.

If you need help with Syncrosim software, try posting a question on the [SyncroSim forum](https://syncrosim.com/forums/){target='blank'}.

<br>
